text: @FLOTUS Today our recognition towards #WorldHealthDay is celebrated by joining the global community to pay tribute to the extraordinary people who are dedicated to fight against the menace of #COVID19. In this regard on behalf of the First Lady we like to thank doctors, nurses,scientists
